trans-unit.source: Azure Resource Manager and Azure Service Management
trans-unit.target: Azure Resource Manager and Azure Service Management

trans-unit.source: This article is for an Azure resource created in Resource Manager, which Microsoft recommends over a resource created in Service Management.
trans-unit.target: This article is for an Azure resource created in Resource Manager, which Microsoft recommends over a resource created in Service Management.

trans-unit.source: For an explanation of the advantages of Resource Manager, see [Azure Compute, Network & Storage Providers under Azure Resource Manager](../articles/virtual-machines/virtual-machines-azurerm-versus-azuresm.md).
trans-unit.target: For an explanation of the advantages of Resource Manager, see [Azure Compute, Network & Storage Providers under Azure Resource Manager](../articles/virtual-machines/virtual-machines-azurerm-versus-azuresm.md).
